hero.heading: Financial Solutions for Your Business
hero.subheading: The smart way to drive and invest
texts: Innolease is your company's partner in leasing matters. We compete for car procurement, financing, and find the leasing option that suits you. Our open operating model where we work together with the customer to define a package that serves the customer's needs.

leasingTypes.heading: Leasing Options
leasingTypes.subheading: Choose the solution that best fits your business
texts: We offer different leasing options for companies' various needs. Each has its own advantages.

cases.title: Financial Leasing
texts: When you want to be in control yourself. A cost-effective and simple option for companies that want to keep the reins in their hands. The car's mileage is not limited and the company is responsible for maintenance and the car's residual value at the end of the rental period.
Suitable for those seeking a cost-effective solution.

cases.title: Flexible Leasing
texts: Freedom and predictability with one contract. Brings maintenance to the same invoice, but costs are determined by actual expenses. Residual value is estimated based on market value.
A good option if you want to combine flexibility and control.

cases.title: Service Leasing
texts: Simplicity and predictability. A hassle-free complete solution. With one monthly price, the company gets a car and desired services – from maintenance to washing and tire services.
Perfect solution for companies that value predictability and convenience.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Leasing
texts: Why choose leasing? Here are the key benefits for your business.

rows: Throughout the contract period, easy to budget
Car in use without large initial investment
New car in use, get rid of the old one effortlessly

minileasing.heading: Mini Leasing for Businesses
texts: Does your business need a car quickly and for a specific period? Mini leasing is a flexible solution for short-term vehicle needs – without long-term commitments or ownership worries.
list: Ready-to-use car immediately – even the next day
Contract period 1–12 months, exactly according to your needs
Fixed monthly price includes insurance, maintenance and tire services
No down payment, no resale worries

equipmentFinancing.heading: Equipment and Machinery Leasing
equipmentFinancing.subheading: Invest in efficiency without large one-time costs
texts: Do you need machinery or equipment for production, construction or business – but don't want to tie up capital or buy outright?
Equipment and machinery leasing offers your business a flexible and cost-effective way to get necessary tools in use immediately – without large one-time costs.

list.description: Equipment remains company property after rental period
Leasing rents can be deducted in taxation
Capital doesn't need to be tied to investment
Doesn't tie fixed assets to balance sheet

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
texts: Here are answers to the most common questions about our financial solutions.

questions.question: What's the difference between financial and service leasing?
questions.answer: In financial leasing, the customer is responsible for maintenance and the car's residual value, while in service leasing all services are included in the fixed monthly price.

questions.question: Can the leasing contract be changed during the period?
questions.answer: Flexible leasing enables flexibility during the contract period. In other leasing types, changes are handled case by case.

questions.question: How does mini leasing differ from regular leasing?
questions.answer: Mini leasing is intended for short-term use (1-12 months) and includes all services. It's a quick solution for temporary needs.
